featured.text: Dr. Begall and her colleagues wanted to know whether larger mammals also have the ability to perceive magnetic fields.
He used an instrument called an MRI (magnetic resonance imaging) to study the brains of two groups of bilingual people.

definition.en_def: Having the properties of a magnet; capable of attracting certain materials, especially iron.
definition.example: The magnetic field around the magnet can attract metal objects.
